column4: I unblacklisted the r818x wireless driver, and now my WPC11v4 is working without ndiswrapper. It has the name wlan0. Only thing is, when I try to connect to my network, it cuts the last letter off of the essid.
So add another letter to the essid beyond what you type in.
BINGO! That did the trick. Yipppeeeee! I had a lot less trouble with the wifi card than I expected. Sweet.
